source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_00<tab>The deputy postmoogle would entrust you with a missive to a certain Seedseer.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_00<tab>先輩レターモーグリは、冒険者にラヤ・オ・センナ宛ての手紙を託したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_01<tab>The deputy postmoogle expresses his concern for two of his most recent recruits who are about to embark on their first delivery assignments. He has compiled copious notes of advice, which he would have you deliver to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil, where she watches over the two aspiring postmoogles.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
冒険者は、ひょんなきっかけから先輩レターモーグリによって配達士に抜擢され、各地へ手紙を配達してきた。しかし、この抜擢の裏には隠された事実があった。長年、たったひとりで各地に配達をしてきた先輩レターモーグリの翼は、長時間の飛空に耐えられないほど消耗していたのだ。真実を知った角尊の姉弟は、配達を禁じようと試みるが、先輩レターモーグリはこれを固持。先輩レターモーグリの配達にかける情熱に胸打たれた角尊の姉弟は、冒険者や黒衣森のモーグリ族を巻き込んで、配達士の後継者育成と、先輩の治療法探しに乗りだした。冒険者たちは果たして、先輩レターモーグリが翼を失う前に、問題を解決することができるのだろうか……。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
先輩レターモーグリから、配達を依頼された。南部森林のキャンプ・トランキル付近にいる「ラヤ・オ・センナ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8801 /var>」を配達しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the letter to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna, but it is too late to benefit the two moogles, who have already flown off on their missions. Fearing for their safety, the Seedseer entreats you to escort them safely to their destinations. Seek out the first moogle in the vicinity of Quarrymill and /rally his spirits.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_02<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナに手紙を届けた。後輩レターモーグリはすでに出発していたが、道に迷っている恐れがあるようだ。南部森林のクォーリーミル周辺で「弱気な後輩モーグリ」に、エモート「励ます」をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_03<tab>Heartened by your words, the moogle summons the strength to carry on toward his destination, while admitting that he may be unable to sustain the sentiment for long. Follow him to the South Shroud near Buscarron's Druthers and /cheer him up should he require encouragement.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_03<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリを励まして、目的地へ向かわせた。南部森林の酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」周辺で「弱気な後輩モーグリ」に、エモート「応援する」をしよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_04<tab>The moogle once again musters his courage and sets off for his destination. Follow him to Buscarron's Druthers and speak with him again there.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_04<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリを応援して、目的地へ向かわせた。酒房「バスカロンドラザーズ」の「弱気な後輩モーグリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_05<tab>Your charge succeeds in delivering the letter to Buscarron, who is pleasantly surprised when the moogle, in his anxiety, appears before him in plain sight. Concerned upon hearing of the deputy postmoogle's plight, the tavern keeper promises to keep an ear out for any information that might serve to aid his recovery. In return, he entrusts you with a letter for Baderon of Limsa Lominsa's Drowning Wench, which was mistakenly delivered to the wrong establishment. Identifying the letter as having been delivered by his brash and overconfident brother, the young postmoogle asks you to watch over him as well. Make for the Gridania airship landing, from which the presumptuous postmoogle is scheduled to depart.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_05<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリは、バスカロンに手紙を届けた。続いて、グリダニア・ランディングにいる「強気な後輩モーグリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_06<tab>The postmoogle insists that he requires no assistance, while saying that you are free to follow him if you wish. To assuage his brother's fears, follow him to Limsa Lominsa and speak with him at the airship landing there.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_06<tab>強気な後輩モーグリと話した。初めて森の外へ出る後輩を見守るため、リムサ・ロミンサ・ランディングにいる「強気な後輩モーグリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_07<tab>The postmoogle appears overwhelmed by the sights and sounds of Limsa Lominsa, though he strongly denies it. Follow your fellow carrier-in-training to the Drowning Wench to see that the letter to Baderon is safely delivered.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_07<tab>強気な後輩モーグリと話したところ、後輩は初めての森の外に恐れをなしているようだ。後輩を見守るため、リムサ・ロミンサの溺れた海豚亭にいる「強気な後輩モーグリ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_08<tab>The moogle was clearly more intimidated by the burly barkeep than he admitted to being, as─not unlike his more timid brother─he blows his cover upon delivering the letter to Baderon, who promises to do what he can to help the deputy postmoogle in his time of need. Taking great pride in his success, the young moogle delegates to you the honor of reporting his deeds to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna. Journey to the Sanctum in the East Shroud and do as you will.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_08<tab>強気な後輩モーグリは、無事にバデロンへ手紙を届けることができた。東部森林の十二神大聖堂にいる「ラヤ・オ・センナ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_09<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna is overjoyed to hear that the two young moogles have successfully completed their task. Though the deputy postmoogle's wounds will yet require time to heal, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna has new ideas that may expedite the recovery process. In the meanwhile, the exploits of the two young moogles have apparently inspired countless young moogles to pursue a career in letter carrying. In recognition of your efforts, the deputy postmoogle names you a full-fledged member of his ranks. Though he has decided to prioritize the training of his new recruits for the time being, the day will surely come again that he requires your aid. Keep your legs strong, and your letter sack ever at the ready!
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SEQ_09<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナに、後輩たちの様子を報告した。先輩レターモーグリのための特効薬を作れる錬金術師を見つけるには、まだ時間がかかりそうだ。しかし、後輩たちが先輩レターモーグリを助けることだろう。冒険者は、これまでの功績をたたえられ、立派な配達士として認められた。今後も、レターモーグリたちが困っていることがあれば、助けてあげよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the letter to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A8801 /var>を配達

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_01<tab>/rally the pusillanimous postmoogle.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_01<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリに「励ます」をする

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_02<tab>/cheer for the pusillanimous postmoogle.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_02<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリに「応援する」をする

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the pusillanimous postmoogle.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_03<tab>弱気な後輩モーグリと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the presumptuous postmoogle at the airship landing in Gridania.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_04<tab>グリダニア・ランディングの強気な後輩モーグリと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the presumptuous postmoogle at the airship landing in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_05<tab>リムサ・ロミンサ・ランディングの強気な後輩モーグリと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_06<tab>Speak with the presumptuous postmoogle at the Drowning Wench.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_06<tab>溺れた海豚亭の強気な後輩モーグリと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_07<tab>Report to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at the Sanctum of the Twelve.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TODO_07<tab>十二神大聖堂のラヤ・オ・センナに報告

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't my favorite whipping <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>─er, my most promising pupil. You couldn't have picked a better time to pay a visit, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000<tab>半人前君……聞いてほしいクポ！
配達士に志願してくれたモーグリたちが、
初めてひとりで配達に出るクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001<tab>Two of my postmoogles-in-training are set to embark on their first assignment. While they have completed a thorough training session administered by yours truly, the sensitive and sympathetic superior─that's <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>─is ever concerned for his subordinates' safety.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001<tab>これまでモグは、ラヤ・オと一緒になって、
後輩君たちにみっちり配達士の指導をしてきたクポ。
だから大丈夫だとは思うけど……ちょっぴり、心配クポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002<tab>I have here in my paws a veritable compendium of choice counsel for the aspiring postmoogle─your task is to deliver it to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna, in whose custody my subordinates have been placed, at Camp Tranquil. Consider it the next stage in your own training, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002<tab>このお手紙に、知ってると役立つ豆知識をしたためたから、
キャンプ・トランキルにいる「ラヤ・オ」に届けてクポ！
後輩君たちも、一緒にいるはずクポ～！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005<tab>Why are you still dallying about when your fellow initiates are in need of your aid? Deliver my sage advice to Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil, that she might see my postmoogles-in-training off to a smooth start on their first assignment!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005<tab>お手紙に、知ってると役立つ豆知識をしたためたから、
キャンプ・トランキルにいる「ラヤ・オ」に届けてクポ！
後輩君たちも、一緒にいるはずクポ～！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_010<tab>Whatever is keeping that deputy postmoogle? He promised he'd drop by to offer some parting words of advice to his newest recruits, but he's taken so long that they've already fluttered off! Hm? You have something for me?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_010<tab>もう、先輩配達士のくせに来るのが遅い～！
かわいい後輩たちは、もう出発しちゃったわよ！
……え、レターモーグリからの手紙ですって！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_011<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Be wary of low-hanging branches, and remember to keep a wide berth of any goobbue maws...<var 1A 01 /var> I say, could this “choice counsel” be any more blindingly obvious?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_011<tab>どれどれ……。
まったく……書いてあるのは、些末なことばかりだわ。
……あの子ったら、心配性なんだから。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_012<tab>That said, I cannot fault the deputy postmoogle for showing concern for his subordinates. After all, 'twas his own injury that pressed the two tyros into active service so far ahead of schedule.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_012<tab>まあ、無理もないか……。
しばらくは、今いる後輩たちに頼るしかない以上、
初めての単独配達で挫折されちゃ困るものね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_013<tab>Sadly, I fear that it will be some time still before his wings are fit for duty. A<var 1F /var>Ruhn believes he has insight as to how a suitable remedy might be formulated, but the process will require the services of a first-rate alchemist.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_013<tab>あの子の翼が治るには、まだ時間がかかりそうなの。
特効薬の作り方は、ア・ルンが見つけたんだけど……
薬を調合できる腕前の錬金術師が見つからなくてね……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_014<tab>Meanwhile, I have two wet-behind-the-ears moogles wandering aimlessly across the realm. I would like nothing more than to see them succeed at their charge─that they might inspire a new generation of aspiring postmoogles─yet I have my doubts that they will do so if left to their own devices.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_014<tab>だから「弱気な後輩モーグリ」と「強気な後輩モーグリ」……
このふたりには、なんとしても初仕事に成功してもらって、
その勢いで、さらに志願者を増やしたいところなの。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_015<tab>I would have accompanied them myself, but I fear my duties as Seedseer leave me little time to play chaperone. Might you be willing to see them safely to their destination in my stead?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_015<tab>そんなわけだから、後輩たちの様子を見てあげてくれない？
もの凄く緊張した様子で、おかしな方向へ飛びたったから、
迷わず配達できているか気になるのよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>The first moogle flew off in the direction of Quarrymill. Though he does not want for enthusiasm, he is easily frightened by unfamiliar sights and sounds. Should you find him in such a state, pray <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his strength and let him know that we stand behind him.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>クォーリーミル周辺で「弱気な後輩モーグリ」を見つけて、
上手くいっていないようなら、「励まして」あげて！
目印は、配達バッグを提げた耳折れモーグリよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_019<tab>The first moogle flew off in the direction of Quarrymill. Though he does not want for enthusiasm, he is easily frightened by unfamiliar sights and sounds. Should you find him in such a state, pray <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> his strength and let him know that we stand behind him.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_019<tab>クォーリーミル周辺で「弱気な後輩モーグリ」を見つけて、
上手くいっていないようなら、「励まして」あげて！
目印は、配達バッグを提げた耳折れモーグリよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_020<tab>I say, this sack must weigh a tonze! N-No, I can't do it─I can't fly another ilm! Oh, woe, woe is me, kupo...! Is there not a single kind soul in this realm who will <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> this poor moogle's sunken spirits?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_020<tab>ぶるぶる……ぶるぶる……。
お仕事があるのに……ぶるぶるで動けないクポ……。
うぅぅ誰か……モグを「励まして」ほしいクポ……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_021<tab>Why, thank you! I daresay you've given me the strength to carry on a bit─wait a moment, I know you! You're the loyal delivery <var 09 E948 ((Hyur)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var> the deputy postmoogle is always talking about, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_021<tab>……そ、そうクポ、ここであきらめちゃダメねクポ！
ありがとう、おかげで少し落ち着いたクポ……
あ、あなたは、半人前の先輩さんクポ！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_022<tab>You came all this way to watch over me? I thank you truly, deeply, from the bottom of my little moogle heart! You are truly a shining example to delivery moogles everywhere!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_022<tab>か、か、か、感謝、感激クポォォォォ！！！
わざわざ、様子を見にきてくれるなんて……
やっぱり配達士は優しくて、かっこいいクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_023<tab>Oh, to think that one day I might be a full-fledged carrier like you and the deputy postmoogle... Why, it would be a dream come true, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_023<tab>モグも、半人前さんや先輩レターモーグリのような、
かっこいい配達士になりたいクポ……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_024<tab>But how can I hope to reach such heights by staying here fluttering in circles!? No, I must deliver this letter safely to Buscarron, just as the deputy postmoogle instructed me!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_024<tab>そのためにも、先輩に教わったとおりに、
バスカロンさんにお手紙を配達してみせるクポ……！！
しゅ、しゅっぱつ……クポ……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_025<tab>And let me just state for the record that no matter what Raya<var 1F /var>O might have told you, I am not intimidated by this task─n-not in the slightest! W-Well, off I go, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_025<tab>で、でも……もし、またモグがぶるぶるしちゃったら、
半人前さんに「応援」してほしいクポ……。
それじゃ、今度こそ、しゅっぱつクポ～。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_030<tab>What our moogle friend lacks in courage, he makes up for with genuine enthusiasm. Should you find him in a dispirited state, pray cheer him on in his task.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_030<tab>クォーリーミル周辺で「弱気な後輩モーグリ」を見つけて、
上手くいっていないようなら、「応援」してあげて！
目印は、配達バッグを提げた耳折れモーグリよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_030<tab>I-I'm not scared, kupo! It... It's just that I've never been this far from home, you see? And what if Buscarron doesn't like moogles? F-Friend, might you be able to offer any words of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_030<tab>ううう……ま、また、ぶるぶるしてきちゃったクポ。
バスカロンさんは……すぐそこなのにクポ……。
半人前さん……モグを「応援」してクポ……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_031<tab>Yes, that is exactly what I needed to hear! You're exactly right... Why, I can do anything I put my pom to, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_031<tab>うわぁぁ～勇気がわいてきたクポ……！
あったかぁい応援、ありがとクポ！
モグ、あと少し……がんばるクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_032<tab>Perhaps you're wondering why one as fearful and faltering as myself doesn't just leave the stressful life of a carrier behind? But you see, what I truly wish to leave behind is my own miserable lack of courage!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_032<tab>……半人前さんは、そんなにモグが恐がるなら、
配達なんてやめればいいのにって思うクポ？
でも、モグがやめたいのは……この弱気なところクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_033<tab>I remember the day like it was yesterday. My dear brother lay wounded, struck in the wing by a particularly savage stroper, and yet I could do nothing but quake and quiver beside him.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_033<tab>兄さんがケガしたときも……モグは、ぶるぶるしちゃったクポ。
そこに偶然とおりがかった先輩レターモーグリが、
兄さんをア・ルンのところに運んでくれたクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_034<tab>It was the deputy postmoogle─who, much to our fortune, was in the vicinity on a delivery assignment─who carried my brother to Camp Tranquil, where A<var 1F /var>Ruhn tended to his injuries.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_034<tab>おかげで兄さんは助かったクポ！
だから今度は、モグたち兄弟が先輩を助けるクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_035<tab>Today, it is our turn! We shall do our duty, and help the postmoogle in his time of need, just as he did for us. And after all <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> have done for <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, it would mean ever so much if you would drop by to witness the moment. I will await you at Buscarron's Druthers, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_035<tab>モグ……がんばって、お仕事をやりとげるクポ！
その瞬間を、半人前さんに見届けてほしいクポ！
バスカロンさんのお店で待ってるから、声をかけてクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>So the young moogle has set off for his final destination? That is heartening news, indeed. Pray stay with him until the task is completed and his mind is fully at ease.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>「弱気な後輩モーグリ」が、無事に目的地につけたら、
声をかけてあげて。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_040<tab>I've made it! Aren't you proud of me, kupo? Now behold, as I deliver this letter straight from my paws to Buscarron's while remaining stealthily out of sight, just as the deputy postmoogle showed me!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_040<tab>……見て見て、モグ、ちゃんとたどりつけたクポ！
次は、先輩レターモーグリに教わったとおりに、
バスカロンさんに、お手紙を届けるクポ……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_041<tab>Bloody hells─if it isn't a moogle, in the flesh! Talk about something you don't see every day!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_041<tab>うぉっと、目の前に突然白いもんが……。
って、コイツはモーグリじゃねーか！？
本物なんて、はじめて拝んだぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_042<tab>Oh no, kupo! In my eagerness, I've gone and blown my cover! The deputy postmoogle will never let me hear the end of it!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_042<tab>クポクポ……ちょっぴり失敗したクポ。
モグ、緊張しすぎて姿を現しちゃったクポ……。
お仕事の時は姿を消せって、先輩に言われたのに……！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_043<tab>So you moogles like to stay out of sight when you make your deliveries, eh? No wonder letters have a habit of appearing out of thin air. Sounds like a right thankless job, but you have my gratitude today.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_043<tab>ほぉ、モーグリは姿を消したまま配達するんだな。
どうりで、ふと気付くと手紙が届いてたりするわけだ。
人知れず、いつもありがとよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_044<tab>Did you hear that!? Mister Buscarron gave me his gratitude! Why, this just might be the happiest day of my life, kupo!
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_044<tab>……えへへ、感謝されるって、気分がいいクポ……！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_045<tab>Since you've proven yourself the capable sort, mayhap you could do me a favor. I've a letter here marked for Baderon in Limsa Lominsa that somehow has found its way here to the Druthers.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_045<tab>そうだ、ついでに頼みたい配達があるんだが大丈夫か？
実はこの前、リムサ・ロミンサのバデロン宛ての手紙が、
間違って俺のところに届けられてな……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_046<tab>Oh, dear me! This is doubtless the work of my confident-yet-careless brother. The two of us, you see, have taken over deliveries here in the Shroud while the deputy postmoogle rests his wounded wings. Oh, pray forgive us our failings, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_046<tab>……ごめんなさい、きっと兄さんが届け間違えたクポ。
先輩レターモーグリが、ア・ルンの治療を受けてるときは、
森の配達を兄さんが手伝ってるクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_047<tab>New to the job, eh? You needn't go flogging yourselves, now. Baderon and I─well, our names and professions do bear more than a passing resemblance, after all. Besides, I daresay that having the chance to meet my first moogle is worth an errant letter or two.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_047<tab>なるほど……それで最近は誤配送が多いのか？
俺もバデロンも酒場の店主で、名前も似てるから無理ねぇさ。
まぁ、おかげでヤツと知り合えたし、むしろ儲けもんだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_048<tab>That said, it troubles me to hear that this associate of yours─the deputy postmoogle, was it?─has come to harm. Might there be anything I could do to lend a hand?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_048<tab>……だが、その先輩レターモーグリの具合が悪いのは心配だな？
日ごろから世話になってるし、俺にできることなら手伝うぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_Q1_000_000<tab>Ask for Buscarron's aid?
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_Q1_000_000<tab>どんな協力を求めますか？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A1_000_001<tab>Speak of the medicine.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A1_000_001<tab>特効薬について話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A1_000_002<tab>Speak of the need for an alchemist.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A1_000_002<tab>錬金術師について話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_049<tab>...I see. You just leave that to me, friend. If memory serves, one of my regulars is something of an expert in such matters.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_049<tab>……なるほど、よし、任せておけ。
その手の話で詳しいヤツを探しておくよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_050<tab>As for Baderon's letter, have no fear! My brother and I will atone for our errors, and see it delivered to the right hands. That said, for all of my brother's bravado, I suspect that deep down he, too, feels a measure of anxiety about his first foray outside the Shroud.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_050<tab>……バデロンさんへの手紙は、兄さんが届けるクポ。
兄さんは、初めて森の外に配達に行くクポ。
だから半人前さん、兄さんに付き添ってほしいクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_051<tab>Might you be so kind as to escort him as you did me? It would mean the realm to me, kupo! We agreed to meet at the Gridania airship landing. I will pass this letter along to him, and wait for you to join us!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_051<tab>兄さん……「強気な後輩モーグリ」は、
グリダニア・ランディングにいるから、声をかけてほしいクポ。
この手紙は、モグが渡しておくクポ～！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_060<tab>I didn't have the heart to tell that poor moogle, but that's the fifth letter for Baderon to come to the Druthers just this week. I'll see what I can do to track down some help─this deputy postmoogle can't get back on the job soon enough, if you ask me.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BUSCARRON_000_060<tab>先輩レターモーグリの具合が悪いのは心配だな……。
こっちも、特効薬を作れる錬金術師の話を探ってみるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_060<tab>The timid one completed his task, you say? Well, that is quite a load off my mind. Might you be kind enough to escort his brother as well? That one, I fear, has more confidence than common sense.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_060<tab>「弱気な後輩モーグリ」は、初仕事が成功したのね！？
ありがとう、おかげで心配がひとつ減ったわ！
次は、「強気な後輩モーグリ」に付き添ってあげて。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_060<tab>Oh, there you are─and not a moment too soon! I had my paws full convincing my brother to delay his departure, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_060<tab>……待ってたクポ！
兄さんを引き留めるのが大変だったのクポ……。
飛び出したくてウズウズしてる兄さんに、声をかけてクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_060<tab>So you're the deputy postmoogle's prized pupil, eh? Didn't he teach you anything about punctuality, kupo!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_060<tab>……ったく、半人前さん、待ちくたびれたぜクポ！
初めての森の外……モグは、わっくわくクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_061<tab>I don't know what my little brother told you, but I've trained my whole life for this. This might be my first time out of the Shroud, but if anyone's up to the task, it's me, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_061<tab>今まで、森の中の配達は、モグが手伝ってたんだぜクポ！
でも、弟に任せられるようになったから、
モグは心置きなく、森の外にびゅーんと飛び出すぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_062<tab>P-Please, Brother! If you got yourself hurt again, I simply couldn't live with myself! Pray let this adventurer accompany you, just for safety's sake, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_062<tab>兄さん……いつものように無茶しないでほしいクポ！
念のため、半人前さんに同行をお願いしておいたクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_063<tab>...Ever the worrywart. Look, just because you can't fly more than two fulms without getting the quivers, it doesn't mean that your brother is in need of a chaperone.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_063<tab>……ったく、お前は弱気すぎる上に心配性すぎクポ！
モグはひとりでも、ぜ～んぜんへっちゃらだぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_064<tab>Th-That's what you said last time, when you almost got yourself swallowed by that slavering stroper! Wh-Why, if the deputy postmoogle hadn't wandered by at that precise moment...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_064<tab>そういって、兄さんは大ケガしたクポ！
あの時、先輩レターモーグリがいなかったら、
兄さんは今ごろ、ここにいなかったクポよ！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_065<tab>That was then─this is now, kupo! I've put on two ponzes of pure muscle and pored over every map of Eorzea to prepare myself for this task! The last thing I need is some glorified sellsword holding my paw.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_065<tab>……同じ失敗なんて、しないぜクポ！
モグは森の外に出るために、た～っくさん鍛えたし、
森の外のお話もた～っくさん聞いたクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_066<tab>Now, enough chitchat─I have an airship to board. If you want to see how a real delivery moogle does his duty, feel free to tag along. Or don't─it's your loss, not mine, kupo.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_066<tab>それじゃ、そろそろ飛空艇に乗りこむぜクポ！
モグは、リムサ・ロミンサ・ランディングで待ってるから、
半人前さんが到着したら、モグに声をかけなクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_070<tab>P-Pray forgive my brother, kupo. You may find it hard to fathom, but there truly is a warm, fuzzy heart under that brusque exterior. You will see that no harm befalls him, won't you?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_070<tab>……口が悪い兄さんで、ゴメンなさいクポ。
イラっとくるかもしれないけど、兄さんをよろしくクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_070<tab>So this is Limsa Lominsa! Everything here is so big and boisterous! And the smell of the sea is sending needles up my nose!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_070<tab>こ、ここがリムサ・ロミンサってとこかクポ……？
体も、声も、でっかいヤツばっかりクポ！
……空気もジトジトだし、なんか生臭いぜクポォォォ～！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_071<tab>N-Nervous? Me!? Patently preposterous, kupo! I was born for this assignment! Did you not notice the aplomb with which I handled my maiden airship voyage? H-Hurk...upo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_071<tab>べっ……べつに……こ、こわいわけじゃねえクポ！
飛空艇だって、サイコ～にキモチよかったぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_072<tab>But no, a buccaneer's den like this is no place for the ordinary moogle. With the deputy postmoogle out of commission, the people of Limsa are lucky indeed that I'm here to shoulder the slack.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_072<tab>でも……先輩レターモーグリは、こんなおっかないところに、
いつもひとりで来てたのかよクポ……？
やっぱり配達士は、イカすぜクポ……！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_073<tab>Speaking of which, I believe I have a letter to deliver. If you care to learn a thing or two, come join me at the Drowning Wench─but you'll want to move fast. I'm a busy moogle, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_073<tab>モ、モグだって、先輩みたいにすいすい配達するぜクポ！
溺れた海豚亭で待ってるから、モグに声をかけなクポ。
早く来ないと、モグの配達を見逃しちゃうぜクポ～！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_080<tab>What took you so long? Take a wrong turn at the Octant? Good thing <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> the one in charge of this assignment!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_080<tab>……は、半人前さん、待ちくたびれたぜクポ～！
そ、それじゃあ……今からモグがお手紙を届けるぞクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_081<tab>Wh-Why haven't I delivered the letter yet? Well, it's <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> because I'm scared of that burly bearded gentleman over there, that's for certain. I just wanted to give you a chance to witness mastery in motion. Now watch me deliver this letter, all discreet-like, kupo...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_081<tab>っ……べつに……ヒゲのおっさんがおっかなくて、
配達できなかったわけじゃねえからなクポ！
モグの勇姿を、半人前さんに見せてあげるためだぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_082<tab>Bugger me with a broadsword! Which one of ye snivelin' sops set yer wind-up moogle loose in my establishment!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_082<tab>うわっとと、驚いた。
おいおい、店の中で急にマメットを出すなよ……。
ほう、噂のレターモーグリのマメットか……出来がいいな！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_083<tab>Wind-up!? Are you blind or just balmy!? I'm a living, breathing moogle─not some glorified child's toy! ...Oops, there goes my cover.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_083<tab>モ、モグは、マメットじゃないぜクポ～！
手紙を届けに来た、正真正銘、本物の配達士クポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_084<tab>Are me eyes and ears to be believed!? A gods-honest moogle, 'ere in the Wench!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_084<tab>……おわっと！？
コ、コイツ、本物のレターモーグリなのか！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_085<tab>A letter? I thank ye, me furry little friend. But strap me to the mast if this ain't a rare pleasure, indeed. I've 'eard many a rumor 'bout yer kind, but I always reckoned ye weren't too keen on lettin' yerselves be seen.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_085<tab>お、おう、配達ありがとよ！
しっかし、本物のモーグリを拝めるなんざツイてるな。
黒衣森でも、ほとんど姿を現さないって噂だぜ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_086<tab>...Ahem. B-But of course. I simply thought that on this momentous occasion─my first foray to your fine nation─I would take the opportunity to personally introduce myself. I'm sure that's what the deputy postmoogle─bless his wounded wings─would have wanted.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_086<tab>モグが初めて森の外に出た、記念の特別待遇クポ！
いつも配達してる先輩レターモーグリが翼を痛めちゃったから、
モグがお手伝いしてるんだぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_087<tab>What's that ye say? One o' yer mates is 'urtin', is 'e? Men in my line o' work tend to know a little somethin' 'bout everythin'. If there's anythin' ye might need o' me, say the word.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_087<tab>ほぉ……そいつは感心だな。
俺らも、レターモーグリには世話になってるから、
手伝えることがあれば、なんでも言ってくれよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_Q2_000_000<tab>Ask for Baderon's aid?
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_Q2_000_000<tab>どんな協力を求めますか？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A2_000_001<tab>Speak of the medicine.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A2_000_001<tab>特効薬について話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A2_000_002<tab>Speak of the need for an alchemist.
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_A2_000_002<tab>錬金術師について話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_088<tab>...Aye, I reckon one o' me regulars just might know a thing or two about that sort o' business─I'll send word if I dig anythin' up. And with that, I'd best get back to pourin' grog afore one o' me customers conks ye in the 'ead with an empty flagon.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_088<tab>……わかった、特効薬を作れる錬金術師の話を集めとくよ。
さぁて、俺はそろそろ仕事に戻るが……
あんたらはゆっくりして、長旅の疲れをいやしてきな。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_089<tab>See? I told you there was nothing to be afraid of! Exploring new environs, forging friendships with the locals─yes, the carrier's life is the life for me, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_089<tab>バデロンさん……見かけはおっかないけど、いい人だなクポ。
知らない場所の知らない人に会うのは、わくわくだぜクポ！
モグ、配達がますます好きになっちゃったぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_090<tab>But what I've accomplished today will have even more far-reaching repercussions. Yes, once my fellow moogles back in the Shroud hear of my stunning success, they'll be beating down our doors to join the postmoogle ranks!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_090<tab>何より、「ありがとう」って言われるのがサイコ～クポ！
森の仲間に自慢して、配達士の志願者を増やしてやるぜクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_091<tab>And since you've been such a loyal observer, I'll give <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> the honor of reporting my deeds to Raya<var 1F /var>O. Oh, if only the deputy postmoogle were here─doubtless he would be moved to tears by my magnanimity! Speaking of which, I really should pay him a visit...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_091<tab>半人前さんも、モグの勇姿を「ラヤ・オ」に報告してクポ！
ラヤ・オたちは、十二神大聖堂で先輩を治療中クポ！
じゃ、モグは先輩のお見舞いに向かうぜクポ～！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_100<tab>Ye just leave the matter of the moogle's treatment to me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Truth be told, I 'ad a mind to keelhaul that moogle if 'e 'anded me another letter for Buscarron─but seein' 'im in person changed all that. Besides, we all 'ad to start somewhere, right?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_BADERON_000_100<tab>特効薬を作る錬金術師の件は、任せときな。
……最近、俺とバスカロンの手紙がよく間違って届いててな。
配達士の連中がテンパってやしねえかと、心配してたとこさ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_100<tab>If it isn't my favorite flunky─er, that is, my most capable colleague! I hear that thanks to you, my two trainees' first assignments were a resounding success! I cannot begin to express my gratitude, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_100<tab>……おかえりクポ。
半人前君のおかげで、後輩君たちのお仕事は大成功クポ。
この治療が終われば、モグも、また少しは配達できるクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_0100<tab>The medicine I have administered will serve to ease the postmoogle's pain. To cure his wounds completely, however, the services of an alchemist─and an exceptional one, at that─are essential.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_0100<tab>これは応急処置で、症状をごまかしてるだけなんだ……。
レターモーグリの翼を治す特効薬が見つかったのに、
薬を作る錬金術師が見つからないからね……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_100<tab>Oh, <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var> you are. I assumed you got gobbled up by a goobbue or something, so I went ahead and shared my success with Raya<var 1F /var>O myself. Don't get down, though─I'm sure she'd love to hear about my exceptional exploits from you, too, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_100<tab>先輩にも、ラヤ・オにも、森の仲間たちにも、
森の外に出たモグの大活躍を自慢したぜクポ！
半人前さんからも、ラヤ・オにモグの勇姿を伝えてクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_100<tab>Oh, thank you, friend! I shudder to think of what trouble my brother might have gotten tangled up in if it hadn't been for you, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_KOWAGARIMOOGLE_000_100<tab>半人前さん、兄さんの付き添い、ありがとクポ！
ア・ルンの治療が終わるまでは、
ここで静かにしてないといけないクポ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_099<tab>The two moogles have safely completed their tasks, you say? I thank you for your efforts. I was just about to depart for the Sanctum to assist my brother with the deputy postmoogle's treatment. Pray join me there─I would speak with you further.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_099<tab>「強気な後輩モーグリ」の配達が終わったのね、ご苦労様。
これから、十二神大聖堂で先輩レターモーグリの治療をするから、
よかったら、あんたも来なさい。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_100<tab>Welcome back. I hear that these two's first assignment was quite the success─and that you played a pivotal role in seeing that it was so. For this, I thank you.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_100<tab>……来たわね。
後輩ふたりが、初仕事をやり遂げたと聞いたわ。
この子たちを見守ってくれてありがとう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_100_100<tab>I must offer my gratitude as well. Knowing that the two younglings were in capable hands allowed me to focus my mind on the deputy postmoogle's treatment, with which I have made considerable progress.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_100_100<tab>……僕からも礼をいうよ。
おかげで、僕もレターモーグリも安心して、
いつもより、じっくり治療ができたよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_101<tab>At first, the mere thought of an adventurer accompanying me on my assignment annoyed me to no end. But now, I say the more, the merrier, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_101<tab>半人前さんと一緒に配達して、モグは気付いたぜクポ！
森の外は、ひとりだと心細いけど、大勢ならごきげんクポ！
それをみんなに教えたら、志願者がわんさか集まったぜクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>And with word of your success spreading throughout the Twelveswood, aspiring delivery moogles are signing up in droves! Why, the ranks have burgeoned such that we could assign two moogles to each task if we so chose─and judging by recent events, that might very well be wise.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>おかげで、森の外の配達には二人組で行かせても、
まだまだ余裕があるぐらい、配達士が増えたのよ！
二人組で行ければ、あたしたちの心配も減るってもんだわ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_103<tab>Heartening tidings, indeed. I daresay that the deputy postmoogle may rest and recuperate for as long as he desires. Why, I might even suggest an early retirement.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_103<tab>先輩レターモーグリの負担も、十分に減ったよ。
……先輩の出る幕がないぐらいにね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_104<tab>Retirement? Gods forbid! I'm still a postmoogle in my prime, kupo! The mere thought of hanging up my letter sack for good─why, wherever would I derive pleasure and meaning from my meager existence!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_104<tab>いやいやクポ！！
モグ……ちょっとだけでも配達したいクポ！
その方が、調子がよくなるクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_105<tab>I most assuredly agree, kupo. The sheer joy of seeing satisfied faces after a job well done instilled me with newfound energy and enthusiasm! After all my superior has done for me, I could not bear to see him deprived of this most splendid sensation!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_105<tab>モグも、先輩は配達を続けたほうがいいと思うぜクポ！
配達は大変だけど、「ありがとう」って言われた時に、
疲れが吹っ飛んで、元気が出たからクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_106<tab>...Intriguing. Thus far, I have concentrated my efforts on physical remedies, but perhaps lightening the postmoogle's spirits might serve to speed the recovery process. At the very least, it is an avenue worth exploring.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_106<tab>配達したほうが元気になるだって……？
なるほど……それは確かにあるかもね。
これを治療に使えないかな……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_107<tab>You just may be onto something there, dear brother!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_107<tab>あんた、冴えてるわね！
それじゃ、その方法を見つけなさいよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_108<tab>So I can resume my duties once I've healed? No more talk of putting me out to pasture, kupo?
target: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_108<tab>それで……モグは、これからも配達していいのクポ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>If that is your true desire, how can we deny it of you? I only ask that you take care not to overexert yourself.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>うん……そのほうが調子いいなら、止める理由はないよ。
……ただし、くれぐれも無理は禁物だよ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_110<tab>By the Twelve, to think I'd ever see a moogle who truly lives for his work! And with all the younglings eager to follow in his footsteps, we should be able to manage without imposing on adventurers for a while.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_RAYAOSENNA_000_110<tab>うふふ、レターモーグリったら嬉しそう。
あんたが駆けずりまわってくれたおかげね、ありがとう。
しばらくは、モーグリたちだけで配達をまかなえそうよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_111<tab>Just leave it to us! My brother and I understand the significance and satisfaction of our job now more than ever. We won't let you down, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_TSUYOKIMOOGLE_000_111<tab>半人前さんが来てくれたおかげで、
弟もモグも、配達のミリョクを知ったクポ！
配達は、モグたちの新しい生きがいだぜクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_112<tab>Now that's the spirit, kupo! And it's all thanks to you, my artful assist─but no, you have proved to be far more than just a helping hand. You have earned the respect of the young ones, and mine as well.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_112<tab>半人前君……ううん、違うクポ。
キミは、もう後輩から慕われてる立派な配達士クポ！
だから敬意を表して、こう呼ぶクポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_113<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>! By the powers vested in me as deputy postmoogle, I hereby name you a full-fledged letter carrier! The honor is typically reserved for moogles, but I am happy to make an exception in your case, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_113<tab>……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>君！
今まで、ホントに、ホントにありがとクポ！
キミはもう、「一人前」クポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_114<tab>While I would love to give you your next assignment, the young ones are in more immediate need of training. But don't let your skills wane, for there is no telling when we will call on you again, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_LETTERMOOGLE_000_114<tab>後輩君たちを鍛えるために、
しばらく配達をお願いすることはないと思うクポ……
でも、モグたちや配達のお仕事を忘れないでね、約束クポ！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>With your successful delivery, your reputation as a letter carrier has grown!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>先輩レターモーグリから託された手紙の配達に成功したため、
「配達士」として成長しました！

source: TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>In recognition of your efforts, the deputy postmoogle has promoted you to the rank of full-fledged letter carrier! Though it may be some time before your next assignment, be ever ready to return to duty should the moogles require your aid.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST030_00362_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>ついに、先輩レターモーグリに「一人前」と認められました！
しばらく配達を手伝う必要はなさそうですが……
いつの日か、また助けを求められたら協力してあげましょう！
